title: Homemade Peach Ice Cream
ingredients: 2 ½ pounds fresh peaches, peeled, pitted and chopped
2 cups whole milk, or as needed
instructions: 1. Gather all ingredients. 2. Working in batches, purée peaches with half-and-half and sugar in a blender or food processor. 3. Mix peach mixture, sweetened condensed milk, evaporated milk, and vanilla in a gallon ice cream freezer container. Pour enough whole milk into the container to reach the fill line, about 2 cups. Pour mixture into an ice cream maker. 4. Freeze according to manufacturer's instructions, about 20 minutes. Transfer to an airtight container and freeze until firm, about 4 hours.
